detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#6)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#68-70)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#43-54)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#16)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#29)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#72-76)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#34)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinanceD.sol#78-80)

fallback() should be declared external:
